title: Bug 61374Version the BCEL libraries to allow graceful failure when the wrong version is found.
description: Bug 61374Version the BCEL libraries to allow graceful failure when the wrong version is found.
OB: We have bugs reported like bug 59921 and bug 60389.These bugs relate to theproblem where the compiler locates the wrong version of BCEL libraries because they are a different version, some of the methods AspectJ calls eitherdon't exist or have different parameter lists.The error the user sees is ahorrible internal compiler error.if we versioned the BCEL libraries as wechanged them, we could check the version found on compiler startup and verifythey are as expected.if the version doesn't match we can report a nicereadable error message that tells the user how to fix it.
